name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Destroys Marine Battleship
keyMoments.description: Law uses his Ope Ope no Mi powers to completely bisect the Marine battleship, demonstrating his devastating abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Law as a serious threat to the Marines on Punk Hazard.

keyMoments.title: Law's Shambles Body-Swap Technique
keyMoments.description: Law uses his Shambles technique to swap the hearts and minds of Sanji, Nami, Franky, and Chopper.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of Law's most versatile abilities that creates major complications for the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Law Cuts Tashigi in Half
keyMoments.description: Law cuts Tashigi in half using his ROOM ability, demonstrating he can slice people apart without killing them.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the precise control and devastating nature of Law's Devil Fruit powers.

abilities.description: Law can swap the positions or hearts of any objects or people within his ROOM, including personality transplant surgery.

reveals.information: Can use Shambles to swap people's minds/hearts into different bodies

name.japanese: チャドロス・ヒゲリゲス

keyMoments.title: Brownbeard's Centaur Form Revealed
keyMoments.description: Brownbeard appears as an alligator-human centaur hybrid, transformed by Caesar Clown and Law after being crippled by Basil Hawkins.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the horrifying experiments being conducted on Punk Hazard.

keyMoments.title: Brownbeard Leads Centaur Attack
keyMoments.description: Brownbeard and his centaur patrol unit ambush the Straw Hats at the frozen lake.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Brownbeard as leader of Caesar's security forces on Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.quote: Fire! Don't let those pirates escape!

reveals.information: Transformed into an alligator-human centaur by Caesar Clown and Law after being crippled
Now works as security chief for Caesar Clown on Punk Hazard

keyMoments.title: Brook's Ice Attack Saves Zoro
keyMoments.description: Brook uses his ice-based soul powers to freeze the centaurs' weapon barrels and save Zoro from sharks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Brook's post-timeskip abilities to use ice techniques.

abilities.description: Brook can use the cold energy of the underworld from his Yomi Yomi no Mi to freeze objects.

keyMoments.title: Tashigi Challenges Law
keyMoments.description: Tashigi attempts to engage Law in sword combat despite Smoker's warnings that her Haki is insufficient.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power gap between Law and the G-5 Marines.

keyMoments.title: Tashigi Cut in Half by Law
keyMoments.description: Law cuts Tashigi in half using his Ope Ope no Mi powers, though she remains alive.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Tashigi's vulnerability against top-tier opponents and Law's surgical precision.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Confronts Law
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Smoker steps in to save Tashigi and begins his confrontation with Law.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the conflict between Smoker and Law that will continue in the following episode.
keyMoments.quote: Your Haki is not strong enough to go up against him, Tashigi!
